name: Airport Ground Handling Simulator VR
summary: This is an Early Access of a consumer version of the professional VR training software developed by AVIAR and used by the biggest airports and ground handlers to train their ground staff on an everyday basis. And finally, it is available to the public. In this VR simulation, your role is a ground crew member and you will perform different tasks during an aircraft turnaround process at the airport. This is a unique first-hand experience with the highest realism, insane details, and a very serious...
